Module kivakit.network.core

Package com.telenav.kivakit.network.core

package com.telenav.kivakit.network.core
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    NetworkResource
    Interface to a network resource.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BaseNetworkResource
    Base class for network resources.
    EmailAddress
    An email address, according to RFC 5322.
    EmailAddress.Converter
    Converts to and from an EmailAddress
    Host
    Represents a host on a network, for which Ports can be retrieved.
    Host.Converter
    Converts to and from Hosts
    LocalHost
    The local Host.
    Loopback
    The loopback adapter 'host'.
    NetworkAccessConstraints
    Access constraints for network requests, including NetworkAccessConstraints.timeout() and authentication requirements.
    NetworkLocation
    A network location with a Port, NetworkPath, NetworkAccessConstraints and optional QueryParameters.
    NetworkLocation.Converter
    Converts to and from a NetworkLocation
    NetworkPath
    An abstraction for network paths.
    NetworkPath.Converter
    Converts to and from NetworkPaths
    NetworkProject
    Project class for kivakit-core-network-core
    Port
    A host, port and protocol.
    Port.Converter
    Converts to and from a Port
    Port.ListConverter
    Converts to and from a list of ports
    Protocol
    An identifier for a particular named protocol
    QueryParameters
    Query parameters, as used in HTTP URLs.
